title: I am very confused
body:
I had some problems with a game I was just in (task bar was open and would close league when I clicked on it. I was red side so this was a pretty bad problem) and tried to restart my computer to solve these problems. When it started back up I was reverted to a 7.4 client and my league won't update so I get an error when trying to sign in on any of my accounts.

I have no idea what caused this, but can I assume the only way to fix this is a lengthy repair of the client?

replies.body:
Based on similar reports I've seen so far, it seems like some players are failing to grab necessary updates and end up on a different version than everyone else.  We've got a [sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)about this up as we track the issue, but found a workaround that might help in the meantime:

Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml within C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open it with a text editor (such as Notepad, TextEdit, or Notepad++) and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
Save the file.
Restart the client.

If that doesn't work, you may need to perform a Force Repatch via the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  This will help make sure you get on the correct version.  I hope that helps!
